channel.title: Does nobody know what to do? male/female wielding visual issues
channel.description:
im currently using a 317 prodigyscape base and am trying to add a few customs. i am trying to add the fallen angel for anyone who knows it and i think i have done everything right in that i added the model and the ints in class 8 are all correct. the compiler compiles everything correctly and i use the "add model" command.
the problem is i log in and the weapon shows up correctly in my inventory and when i drop it but when wielded it shows up as some other weapon or shape. i checked and doubled checked int's 165 and 200 which are for wielding and nothing seems wrong.
does anyone have an idea what might be wrong? any help would be very much appreciated.
